languages.text: "Я дам тебе шанс, Хротко. Ты будешь разжалован и пострижен в послушники в часовне, где будешь проводить дни в покаянии и служении".
"I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become an initiate at the shrine, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."
languages.original_text: "Я дам тебе шанс, Хротко. Ты будешь разжалован и пострижен в послушники в часовне, где будешь проводить дни в покаянии и служении".

traits.locale_text: "I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You will be demoted and become a novice in the chapel, to spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."
"Assign him to a penal maintenance unit. Execution is uncalled for."
"I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become a novice in the chapel, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."
"I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become a novice in the chapel, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."
"I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become an initiate at the shrine, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."
"I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You will be demoted and become a novice in the chapel, to spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."
"I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become an initiate at the shrine, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."

languages.text: « Je vais vous donner une chance, Hrotko. Vous serez rétrogradé et relégué au rang d'initié au sanctuaire, où vous passerez le restant de vos jours en pénitence et dans la servitude. »
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become an initiate at the shrine, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous donner une chance, Hrotko. Vous serez rétrogradé et relégué au rang d'initié au sanctuaire, où vous passerez le restant de vos jours en pénitence et dans la servitude. »
« Affectez-le plutôt à une unité de maintenance carcérale. Une condamnation à mort serait disproportionnée. »

languages.text: «Le daré una oportunidad, Hrotko. Queda degradado a iniciado del templo, donde pasará el resto de sus días en penitencia y servicio».
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become an initiate at the shrine, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."

traits.locale_text: «Le daré una oportunidad, Hrotko. Queda degradado a iniciado del templo, donde pasará el resto de sus días en penitencia y servicio».
«Asígnelo a una unidad penal de mantenimiento. La ejecución es innecesaria».

languages.text: “我打算再给你一次机会，赫洛卡。从今天开始，你被降职为助祭。你要在神殿里进行苦修，以此悔过。”
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become an initiate at the shrine, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."

traits.locale_text: “我打算再给你一次机会，赫洛卡。从今天开始，你被降职为助祭。你要在神殿里进行苦修，以此悔过。”
“没必要处决，把他发配到刑罚苦力小队吧。”

languages.text: 「チャンスをやろう、フロトコ。お前は降格され、神殿で伝授者となり、そこで懺悔と隷属の日々を送ることになる」
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become an initiate at the shrine, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."

traits.locale_text: 「チャンスをやろう、フロトコ。お前は降格され、神殿で伝授者となり、そこで懺悔と隷属の日々を送ることになる」
「代わりに彼を刑事整備班に配属せよ。処刑は相応しくない」

languages.text: "Ich gebe Euch eine Chance, Hrotko. Ihr werdet degradiert und dient fortan als Novize des Schreins, um den Rest Eures Lebens in Buße und Knechtschaft zu verbringen."
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Hrotko. You are to be demoted and to become an initiate at the shrine, where you will spend the rest of your days in penance and servitude."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe Euch eine Chance, Hrotko. Ihr werdet degradiert und dient fortan als Novize des Schreins, um den Rest Eures Lebens in Buße und Knechtschaft zu verbringen."
"Weist ihn stattdessen einem Strafwartungstrupp zu. Eine Hinrichtung ist überzogen."
